name: Python-Games
tagline: A place where you can see my work and give me pointers on what I could do better with Python.
body:
### Mac OS X Downloads
PaddleBall DMG File: [Download](http://gallifrey.dontaskmeagain.com/dmgs/PaddleBall.dmg)

### What is this?
These programs are programs that I built to show you what I can do with Python when creating video games.

### Who am I?
My name is Owen, I am one of Jehovahs Witnesses and am 12 years old. I can program in HTML, CSS, JS, Perl, Python, Ruby, Swift 2, Objective-C, and Lua.

### What is PaddleBall?
PaddleBall is my prized video game. Its a video game based off of Bounce! I will turn it into my favorite game.

### What is StickStory?
StickStory is a game where you run, jump, and glide towards the door. But, watch out for the Eraser! He cant hurt you if you jump on top of him or hit under him, only from the sides, so be carful.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
